channel.title: Type Theory on Elliot's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Type Theory on Elliot's Blog

item.title: What even is type theory?
item.description: The problem with being self-taught in PLs is that I sort of learned everything at the same time, which means I did not get a good sense of what things fall in what categories. In this post I seek to determine, once and for all, what is type theory and what is not.
